name: parallel-gatk-realigner-3
title: Realign BAM alignment with HaplotypeCaller
summary: Run GATK 4 HaplotypeCaller to realign an alignment around indels. Uses the --bamout option of HaplotypeCaller.

inputSpec.name: GATK_distribution
inputSpec.label: GATK distribution
inputSpec.help: The distribution of the GATK software used to run HaplotypeCaller.

inputSpec.name: Sorted_Bam_Index
inputSpec.label: Sorted BAM alignment index
inputSpec.help: An index of the sorted BAM alignment.

inputSpec.name: Genome
inputSpec.label: Reference genome.
inputSpec.help: Genome in FASTA format compressed with bgzip.

inputSpec.name: Reorder_BAM
inputSpec.label: Reorder BAM to Reference.
inputSpec.help: Run a step where the BAM is reordered to match the reference.

outputSpec.name: Realigned_Bam_Index
outputSpec.label: BAM alignment index
outputSpec.help: BAM alignment index, realigned with HaplotypeCaller.
